title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Breaking down Russell Wilson, Broncos' loss to Chargers; Bucs DT Vita Vea on Tom Brady missing Bucs walkthrough & roughin   g the passer calls
itunes:title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Breaking down Russell Wilson, Broncos' loss to Chargers; Bucs DT Vita Vea on Tom Brady missing Bucs walkthrough & roughin   g the passer calls
description:
Richard and Mitch react to the Denver Broncos' overtime loss to Justin Herbert & the Los Angeles Chargers on Monday Night Football. Richard discusses Russell Wilson's disappointing second half and how the defense must be feeling about their 2-4 record despite only allowing six touchdowns all season. They also react to the Dallas Cowboys loss to the Philadelphia Eagles. Tampa Bay Buccaneers DT Vita Vea joins Richard for the second half of the show to discuss the Bucs' loss to the Pittsburgh Steelers, what they need to turn their season around, and Bruce Arians still hanging around after ceding the head coaching job to Todd Bowles. Vita also discusses if anyone in the locker room cared that Tom Brady missed a walkthrough to attend Robert Kraft's wedding. #volume #herd #ColinCowherd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
